name: Azteca Vampiro
description:
****** Controls ******

X : Attack

Z: Jump

Space: Dash

Move: WASD 

- Joystick is supported -

****** Game *********

Hello, this is an early project i made in godot in my free time. This tells the story of an aztec hunter that goes out with a few friends, but then when they go back to their village Hernan Cortez attacks the village and turns aztec gods against them. So our hero has to fight the aztec gods in his journey, discovering new dungeons and travelling through the pre hispanic lands.
